MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH43 postcode area of Innerleithen. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:45am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of adverse weather conditions and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10am on  Friday, 04 December 2020
